SELECT p.label, o.price
FROM product p
LEFT JOIN offer o
ON p.nr=o.product
WHERE product=1
SELECT ?nombre  ?precio
WHERE { 
:Product1 a bsbm:Product
:Product1 rdfs:label ?nombre
OPT {  :Product1 :hasPrice ?precio}
}
